description: Try our easy to follow Minced Crab Balls recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Minced Crab Balls Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 medium fresh medium-hot red chilli, deseeded

recipeInstructions.text: Put the crabmeat, chilli, garlic, coriander, lemon zest and juice, and fish sauce in a food processor. Whiz until a rough paste forms, then add the beaten egg and plenty of salt and black pepper. Whiz again.
Scoop the mixture up using your hands, and roll into 2.5cm (1in) balls. Tip the breadcrumbs onto a plate, and roll the crab balls in them until well covered.

Heat a little of the oil in a frying pan over a medium heat. Add a few of the balls at a time to the pan, to cook in batches. Shallow-fry for about 5 minutes until golden all over, moving the balls around the pan so that they brown evenly, topping up with more oil as needed. Drain on kitchen paper. Serve hot with soy sauce and sweet chilli sauce for dipping.
